metadata.title: CVE-2024-23280 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description:
An injection issue was addressed with improved validation. This issue isfixed in Safari 17.4, macOS Sonoma 14.4, iOS 17.4 and iPadOS 17.4, watchOS10.4, tvOS 17.4. A maliciously crafted webpage may be able to fingerprintthe user.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-23280` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

gir1.2-javascriptcoregtk-4.1 - 2.44.0-2
gir1.2-javascriptcoregtk-6.0 - 2.44.0-2
gir1.2-webkit-6.0 - 2.44.0-2
gir1.2-webkit2-4.1 - 2.44.0-2
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.0-bin - 2.44.0-2
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.1-0 - 2.44.0-2
libjavascriptcoregtk-6.0-1 - 2.44.0-2
libjavascriptcoregtk-bin - 2.44.0-2
libwebkit2gtk-4.1-0 - 2.44.0-2
libwebkitgtk-6.0-4 - 2.44.0-2
webkit2gtk-driver - 2.44.0-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: webkit2gtk package in noble, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.44.0-2').
qtwebkit-opensource-src package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
